title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When invalid data is entered on any preference page and it is flagged in the UI, attempting to select another page without fixing the problem results in a warning dialog that states: 'Warning: The currently displayed page contains invalid values.'
EB: The warning dialog should be changed to an error dialog because users should not be allowed to navigate away from the page without fixing the invalid values.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Enter invalid data on a preference page. 2. Attempt to select another page without fixing the problem. 3. Observe the warning dialog.
